Daisuke Yano |distributor = The Klock Worx Company Ltd. |released = September 12, 2002 |runtime = 110 minutes (Theatrical)
118 minutes (Director's Cut) |language = [[Japanese language|Japanese]] }} '''''Alive''''' is a 2002 Japanese [[science fiction film]] directed by [[Ryuhei Kitamura]]. Based on the manga of the same name, the film focuses on Tenshu, a convict placed in an isolated cell with another convict and a mysterious woman possessed by an extraterrestrial life form known as the "Isomer", which possesses those with murderous instincts. The film stars [[Hideo Sakaki]], Ryo, Koyuki, Erika Oda, [[Jun Kunimura]], Bengal, Tetta Sugimoto, and [[Tak Sakaguchi]]. ==Cast== * [[Hideo Sakaki]] as Tenshu Yashiro * [[Ryō (actress)|Ryō]] as Yurika Saegusa * [[Koyuki]] as Asuka Saegusa * [[Shun Sugata]] as Matsuda * [[Erika Oda]] as Misako Hara * [[Tak Sakaguchi]] as Zeros * [[Jun Kunimura]] as Kojima * [[Ryushi Mizukami]] as Warden 1 * [[Keita Kimura]] as Warden 2 * [[Minoru Aoki]] as Warden 3 * Boba as Hair Cut Guard * [[Takanori Hamachika]] as Guard 1 * [[Minoru Matsumoto]] as SWAT 1 * [[Yuichiro Arai]] as SWAT 2 * [[Kazuhito Ohba]] as SWAT 3 * [[Hiroyuki Yoshida]] as SWAT 6 * [[Kenji Matsuda]] as SWAT Leader * [[Bengal]] as Tokutake * [[Tetta Sugimoto]] as Gondoh ==Notes== {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb title|id=0331834|title=Alive}} * {{Amg movie|301834|Alive}} * {{cite web |url=http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/2003/ea002420.htm|script-title=ja:ＡＬＩＶＥ|accessdate=2007-07-21|language=Japanese|publisher=[[Japanese Movie Database]]| archiveurl= https://web.archive.org/web/20070820191940/http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/2003/ea002420.htm| archivedate= 20 August 2007 | deadurl= no}} {{Ryuhei Kitamura}} [[Category:2002 films]] [[Category:Live-action films based on manga]] [[Category:Films directed by Ryuhei Kitamura]] [[Category:Japanese-language films]] [[Category:English-language films]] [[Category:2000s action films]] [[Category:Science fiction action films]] [[Category:Japanese action films]] [[Category:2000s science fiction films]]
